function.name: get_customer_by_phone
function.description: Finds a customer by their primary contact or line phone number.

phone_number.description: The phone number to search for.
phone_number.title: Phone Number

function.name: get_customer_by_id
function.description: Retrieves a customer directly by their unique ID.

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

function.name: get_customer_by_name
function.description:
Searches for customers by name and DOB. May return multiple matches if names are similar,

DOB helps disambiguate.

full_name.description: The full name of the customer.
full_name.title: Full Name

dob.description: Date of birth for verification, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
dob.title: Dob

function.name: get_details_by_id
function.description:
Retrieves the details for a given ID.

The ID must be a valid ID for a Customer, Line, Device, Bill, or Plan.

id.description: The ID of the object to retrieve.
id.title: Id

function.name: suspend_line
function.description:
Suspends a specific line (max 6 months).

Checks: Line status must be Active.
Logic: Sets line status to Suspended, records suspension_start_date.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to suspend.
line_id.title: Line Id

function.name: resume_line
function.description:
Resumes a suspended line.

Checks: Line status must be Suspended or Pending Activation.
Logic: Sets line status to Active, clears suspension_start_date.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to resume.
line_id.title: Line Id

function.name: get_bills_for_customer
function.description: Retrieves a list of the customer's bills, most recent first.

limit.description: Maximum number of bills to return.
limit.title: Limit

function.name: send_payment_request
function.description:
Sends a payment request to the customer for a specific bill.

Checks:
    - Customer exists
    - Bill exists and belongs to the customer
    - No other bills are already awaiting payment for this customer
Logic: Sets bill status to AWAITING_PAYMENT and notifies customer.
Warning: This method does not check if the bill is already PAID.
Always check the bill status before calling this method.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the bill.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

bill_id.description: ID of the bill to send payment request for.
bill_id.title: Bill Id

function.name: get_data_usage
function.description:
Retrieves current billing cycle data usage for a line, including data

refueling amount, data limit, and cycle end date.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to check usage for.
line_id.title: Line Id

function.name: enable_roaming
function.description: Enables international roaming on a line.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to enable roaming for.
line_id.title: Line Id

function.name: disable_roaming
function.description: Disables international roaming on a line.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to disable roaming for.
line_id.title: Line Id

function.name: transfer_to_human_agents
function.description:
Transfer the user to a human agent, with a summary of the user's issue.

Only transfer if
 -  the user explicitly asks for a human agent
 -  given the policy and the available tools, you cannot solve the user's issue.

summary.description: A summary of the user's issue.
summary.title: Summary

function.name: refuel_data
function.description:
Refuels data for a specific line, adding to the customer's bill.

Checks: Line status must be Active, Customer owns the line.
Logic: Adds data to the line and charges customer based on the plan's refueling rate.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to refuel data for.
line_id.title: Line Id

gb_amount.description: Amount of data to add in gigabytes.
gb_amount.title: Gb Amount

function.name: calculate
function.description: Calculate the result of a mathematical expression.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to calculate, such as '2 + 2'. The expression can contain numbers, operators (+, -, *, /), parentheses, and spaces.
expression.title: Expression

function.name: cancel_pending_order
function.description:
Cancel a pending order. If the order is already processed or delivered,

it cannot be cancelled. The agent needs to explain the cancellation detail
and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed. If the user confirms,
the order status will be changed to 'cancelled' and the payment will be refunded.
The refund will be added to the user's gift card balance immediately if the payment
was made using a gift card, otherwise the refund would take 5-7 business days to process.
The function returns the order details after the cancellation.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

reason.description: The reason for cancellation, which should be either 'no longer needed' or 'ordered by mistake'.
reason.title: Reason

function.name: exchange_delivered_order_items
function.description:
Exchange items in a delivered order to new items of the same product type.

For a delivered order, return or exchange can be only done once by the agent.
The agent needs to explain the exchange detail and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

item_ids.description: The item ids to be exchanged, each such as '1008292230'. There could be duplicate items in the list.
item_ids.title: Item Ids

new_item_ids.description:
The item ids to be exchanged for, each such as '1008292230'.
There could be duplicate items in the list. Each new item id should match the item id
in the same position and be of the same product.
new_item_ids.title: New Item Ids

payment_method_id.description:
The payment method id to pay or receive refund for the item price difference,
such as 'gift_card_0000000' or 'credit_card_0000000'. These can be looked up
from the user or order details.
payment_method_id.title: Payment Method Id

function.name: find_user_id_by_name_zip
function.description:
Find user id by first name, last name, and zip code. If the user is not found, the function

will return an error message. By default, find user id by email, and only call this function
if the user is not found by email or cannot remember email.

first_name.description: The first name of the customer, such as 'John'.
first_name.title: First Name

last_name.description: The last name of the customer, such as 'Doe'.
last_name.title: Last Name

zip.description: The zip code of the customer, such as '12345'.
zip.title: Zip

function.name: find_user_id_by_email
function.description: Find user id by email. If the user is not found, the function will return an error message.

email.description: The email of the user, such as 'something@example.com'.
email.title: Email

function.name: get_order_details
function.description: Get the status and details of an order.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

function.name: get_product_details
function.description: Get the inventory details of a product.

product_id.description: The product id, such as '6086499569'. Be careful the product id is different from the item id.
product_id.title: Product Id

function.name: get_user_details
function.description: Get the details of a user, including their orders.

function.name: list_all_product_types
function.description:
List the name and product id of all product types.

Each product type has a variety of different items with unique item ids and options.
There are only 50 product types in the store.

function.name: modify_pending_order_address
function.description: Modify the shipping address of a pending order. The agent needs to explain the modification detail and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

address1.description: The first line of the address, such as '123 Main St'.
address1.title: Address1

address2.description: The second line of the address, such as 'Apt 1' or ''.
address2.title: Address2

function.name: modify_pending_order_items
function.description: Modify items in a pending order to new items of the same product type. For a pending order, this function can only be called once. The agent needs to explain the exchange detail and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

item_ids.description: The item ids to be modified, each such as '1008292230'. There could be duplicate items in the list.
item_ids.title: Item Ids

new_item_ids.description: The item ids to be modified for, each such as '1008292230'. There could be duplicate items in the list. Each new item id should match the item id in the same position and be of the same product.
new_item_ids.title: New Item Ids

payment_method_id.description: The payment method id to pay or receive refund for the item price difference, such as 'gift_card_0000000' or 'credit_card_0000000'. These can be looked up from the user or order details.
payment_method_id.title: Payment Method Id

function.name: modify_pending_order_payment
function.description: Modify the payment method of a pending order. The agent needs to explain the modification detail and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

payment_method_id.description: The payment method id to pay or receive refund for the item price difference, such as 'gift_card_0000000' or 'credit_card_0000000'. These can be looked up from the user or order details.
payment_method_id.title: Payment Method Id

function.name: modify_user_address
function.description: Modify the default address of a user. The agent needs to explain the modification detail and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed.

address1.description: The first line of the address, such as '123 Main St'.
address1.title: Address1

address2.description: The second line of the address, such as 'Apt 1' or ''.
address2.title: Address2

function.name: return_delivered_order_items
function.description:
Return some items of a delivered order.

The order status will be changed to 'return requested'.
The agent needs to explain the return detail and ask for explicit user confirmation (yes/no) to proceed.
The user will receive follow-up email for how and where to return the item.

order_id.description: The order id, such as '#W0000000'. Be careful there is a '#' symbol at the beginning of the order id.
order_id.title: Order Id

item_ids.description: The item ids to be returned, each such as '1008292230'. There could be duplicate items in the list.
item_ids.title: Item Ids

payment_method_id.description:
The payment method id to pay or receive refund for the item price difference, such as 'gift_card_0000000' or 'credit_card_0000000'.
These can be looked up from the user or order details.
payment_method_id.title: Payment Method Id

function.name: transfer_to_human_agents
function.description:
Transfer the user to a human agent, with a summary of the user's issue.

Only transfer if
 -  the user explicitly asks for a human agent
 -  given the policy and the available tools, you cannot solve the user's issue.

summary.description: A summary of the user's issue.
summary.title: Summary

function.name: book_reservation
function.description: Book a reservation.

date.description: The date for the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.
date.title: Date

dob.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format
dob.title: Dob

user_id.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation such as 'sara_doe_496'`.
user_id.title: User Id

origin.description: The IATA code for the origin city such as 'SFO'.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The IATA code for the destination city such as 'JFK'.
destination.title: Destination

flight_type.description: The type of flight such as 'one_way' or 'round_trip'.
flight_type.title: Flight Type

cabin.description: The cabin class such as 'basic_economy', 'economy', or 'business'.
cabin.title: Cabin

flights.description: An array of objects containing details about each piece of flight.
flights.title: Flights

passengers.description: An array of objects containing details about each passenger.
passengers.title: Passengers

payment_methods.description: An array of objects containing details about each payment method.
payment_methods.title: Payment Methods

total_baggages.description: The total number of baggage items to book the reservation.
total_baggages.title: Total Baggages

nonfree_baggages.description: The number of non-free baggage items to book the reservation.
nonfree_baggages.title: Nonfree Baggages

function.name: calculate
function.description: Calculate the result of a mathematical expression.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to calculate, such as '2 + 2'. The expression can contain numbers, operators (+, -, *, /), parentheses, and spaces.
expression.title: Expression

function.name: cancel_reservation
function.description: Cancel the whole reservation.

function.name: get_reservation_details
function.description: Get the details of a reservation.

function.name: get_user_details
function.description: Get the details of a user, including their reservations.

function.name: list_all_airports
function.description: Returns a list of all available airports.

function.name: search_direct_flight
function.description: Search for direct flights between two cities on a specific date.

origin.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.
destination.title: Destination

date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-01-01'.
date.title: Date

function.name: search_onestop_flight
function.description: Search for one-stop flights between two cities on a specific date.

origin.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.
destination.title: Destination

date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.
date.title: Date

function.name: send_certificate
function.description: Send a certificate to a user. Be careful!

user_id.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation, such as 'sara_doe_496'.
user_id.title: User Id

amount.description: The amount of the certificate to send.
amount.title: Amount

function.name: transfer_to_human_agents
function.description:
Transfer the user to a human agent, with a summary of the user's issue.

Only transfer if
 -  the user explicitly asks for a human agent
 -  given the policy and the available tools, you cannot solve the user's issue.

summary.description: A summary of the user's issue.
summary.title: Summary

function.name: update_reservation_baggages
function.description: Update the baggage information of a reservation.

total_baggages.description: The updated total number of baggage items included in the reservation.
total_baggages.title: Total Baggages

nonfree_baggages.description: The updated number of non-free baggage items included in the reservation.
nonfree_baggages.title: Nonfree Baggages

payment_id.description: The payment id stored in user profile, such as 'credit_card_7815826', 'gift_card_7815826', 'certificate_7815826'.
payment_id.title: Payment Id

function.name: update_reservation_flights
function.description: Update the flight information of a reservation.

date.description: The date for the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.
date.title: Date

cabin.description: The cabin class of the reservation
cabin.title: Cabin

flights.description: An array of objects containing details about each piece of flight in the ENTIRE new reservation. Even if the a flight segment is not changed, it should still be included in the array.
flights.title: Flights

payment_id.description: The payment id stored in user profile, such as 'credit_card_7815826', 'gift_card_7815826', 'certificate_7815826'.
payment_id.title: Payment Id

function.name: update_reservation_passengers
function.description: Update the passenger information of a reservation.

dob.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format
dob.title: Dob

passengers.description: An array of objects containing details about each passenger.
passengers.title: Passengers

function.name: get_flight_status
function.description: Get the status of a flight.
